name: Moving Average Crossover (Framework)
description: Moving Average Crossover strategy implemented using the Algorithm Framework. Demonstrates modular architecture with separate universe, alpha, portfolio, and execution components.
author: QuantLib
documentation:
This strategy demonstrates the Algorithm Framework approach. It uses:
- ManualUniverse for symbol selection
- MovingAverageAlpha for signal generation
- EqualWeightingPortfolio for position sizing
- ImmediateExecutionModel for order execution

This modular approach makes it easy to swap components and build more complex strategies.
